org.kiji.schema
Interface KijiTableReaderBuilder

All Known Implementing Classes:
HBaseKijiTableReaderBuilder
@ApiAudience.Public
@ApiStability.Experimental
@Inheritance.Sealed
public interface KijiTableReaderBuilder

Builder for KijiTableReaders with options.

Options include:

  • Setting the behavior of a reader when a cell decoder cannot be found in the decoder cache.
  • Setting a map of overriding default read behavior per column.
  • Setting a map of alternative read behaviors which will be included in the decoder cache, but which will not change default read behavior.

Nested Class Summary
static class KijiTableReaderBuilder.OnDecoderCacheMiss

DEFAULT_CACHE_MISS

static final KijiTableReaderBuilder.OnDecoderCacheMiss DEFAULT_CACHE_MISS
By default, build and cache new cell decoders for unknown ColumnReaderSpec overrides.

Method Detail

withOnDecoderCacheMiss

KijiTableReaderBuilder withOnDecoderCacheMiss(KijiTableReaderBuilder.OnDecoderCacheMiss behavior)
Configure the KijiTableReaderOptions to include the given OnDecoderCacheMiss behavior. If unset this option defaults to KijiTableReaderBuilder.OnDecoderCacheMiss.BUILD_AND_CACHE.

Parameters:
behavior - OnDecoderCacheMiss behavior to use when a ColumnReaderSpec override specified in a KijiDataRequest cannot be found in the prebuilt cache of cell decoders.
Returns:
this builder.

getOnDecoderCacheMiss

KijiTableReaderBuilder.OnDecoderCacheMiss getOnDecoderCacheMiss()
Get the configured OnDecoderCacheMiss behavior or null if none has been set.

Returns:
the configured OnDecoderCacheMiss behavior or null if none has been set.

withColumnReaderSpecOverrides

KijiTableReaderBuilder withColumnReaderSpecOverrides(Map<KijiColumnName,ColumnReaderSpec> overrides)
Configure the KijiTableReaderOptions to include the given ColumnReaderSpec overrides. These ColumnReaderSpecs will be used to determine read behavior for associated columns. These overrides will change the default behavior of the associated column when read by this reader, even when no ColumnReaderSpec is specified in a KijiDataRequest. If unset this option defaults to not override any columns.

Parameters:
overrides - mapping from columns to overriding read behavior for those columns.
Returns:
this builder.

getColumnReaderSpecOverrides

Map<KijiColumnName,ColumnReaderSpec> getColumnReaderSpecOverrides()
Get the configured ColumnReaderSpec overrides or null if none have been set.

Returns:
the configured ColumnReaderSpec overrides or null if none have been set.

withColumnReaderSpecAlternatives

KijiTableReaderBuilder withColumnReaderSpecAlternatives(com.google.common.collect.Multimap<KijiColumnName,ColumnReaderSpec> alternatives)
Configure the KijiTableReaderOptions to include the given ColumnReaderSpecs as alternate reader schema options for the associated columns. Setting these alternatives does not change the behavior of associated columns when ColumnReaderSpecs are not included in KijiDataRequests. ColumnReaderSpecs included here can be used as reader spec overrides in KijiDataRequests without triggering KijiTableReaderBuilder.OnDecoderCacheMiss.FAIL and without the cost associated with constructing a new cell decoder. If unset this option defaults to not create any alternative cell decoders.

Note: ColumnReaderSpec overrides provided to withColumnReaderSpecOverrides(java.util.Map) should not be duplicated here.

Parameters:
alternatives - mapping from columns to reader spec alternatives which the KijiTableReader will accept as overrides in data requests.
Returns:
this builder.

getColumnReaderSpecAlternatives

com.google.common.collect.Multimap<KijiColumnName,ColumnReaderSpec> getColumnReaderSpecAlternatives()
Get the configured ColumnReaderSpec alternatives or null if none have been set.

Returns:
the configured ColumnReaderSpec alternatives or null if none have been set.

buildAndOpen

KijiTableReader buildAndOpen()
                             throws IOException
Build a new KijiTableReaderOptions from the values set in this builder. The user is responsible for closing this reader when it is no longer needed.

Returns:
a new KijiTableReaderOptions from the values set in this builder.
Throws:
IOException - in case of an error building the reader.
